name: Forgotten Regent
movement: 30 feet walking and 50 feet flying provides good mobility
description: The Forgotten Regent manifests as a powerful leader of necromantic forces, wielding frost abilities to immobilize foes and empower allies. It has an imposing presence that commands legions of undead.
memorable: Can petrify enemies in magical ice and summon undead to fight at its side.
goals: To lead and enhance its undead forces in battle.
relations: Typically commands legions of undead like skeletons and zombies.
environment: Often found in dark and desolate areas, controlling undead minions.
strengths: Immunity to cold, necrotic, and poison, with high hit points and a variety of battlefield control abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire and reliant on undead companions for full effectiveness.
attacks: Uses 'Frozen Rune Maul' for melee attacks dealing bludgeoning and cold damage, or 'Frost Blast' for ranged cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Glacier Imprisonment can petrify opponents in ice, severely limiting their combat capabilities.
senses: Has darkvision and a passive perception of 16, giving it a keen awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in perception, providing average awareness.
additional_information: Can move through objects and creatures as difficult terrain.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saves three times a day.
Empowers undead allies with temporary hit points.
Calls forth additional undead allies once per day.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
test_queries: creature that petrifies with ice powers
